plot: After Kevin's failed attempt at asking Angela out on a date, he is visited by an angel by the name of Adam. Using Adam's powers, Kevin is given three more chances to gain the confidence needed to ask Angela out... again.
title: Third Time's the Charm
plot_es: After Kevin's failed attempt at asking Angela out on a date, he is visited by an angel by the name of Adam. Using Adam's powers, Kevin is given three more chances to gain the confidence needed to ask Angela out... again.
plot_en: After Kevin's failed attempt at asking Angela out on a date, he is visited by an angel by the name of Adam. Using Adam's powers, Kevin is given three more chances to gain the confidence needed to ask Angela out... again.
